attributes.additional_details:
20% of women experience sexual assault by 16
510,000 women between 16-59 had experienced a sexual assault last year
 85,000 women (16-59) experienced rape, attemped rape or sexual assault by penetration
 15% were reported to the police
Source : rapecrisis.org.uk
attributes.background: We wish to have better support for victims and harsher punishment for sexual assaults perpetrators in the hopes of decreasing it.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for all sexual offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577443

Make sexual harassment a specific criminal offence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
